title: Ariana Grande and Dalton Gomez are officially married
body: Ariana Grande and Dalton Gomez are officially marriedBy Chloe Melas, CNNUpdated 10:32 AM ET, Tue May 18, 2021 JUST WATCHEDAriana Grande secretly marries her fiancéReplayMore Videos ...MUST WATCH (16 Videos)Ariana Grande secretly marries her fiancéKate Hudson snips off boyfriend's ponytailLovato reveals they are nonbinary, changing their pronounsVideo: 'SNL' cold open goes over new mask rulesEmotional Ellen DeGeneres announces her show is endingChild reporter who interviewed Obama has died at 23Michael Jordan reveals last the text message from Kobe BryantKareem Abdul-Jabbar on NBA's new Social Justice Champion AwardWoman wakes days after surgery with different accentJoan Rivers' luxurious (and haunted?) NYC penthouse lists for $38MBillie Eilish admits wearing Billie Eilish wig on talk showSydney Sweeney scolds internet trolls on InstagramDylan Dreyer of "Today" reveals her pregnancy with bun-themed videoRob Gronkowski says he could beat Tom Brady at cornhole and hopes fans return to stadiumsWatch: Former Obama speechwriter trolls Newsmax anchor live on TVRare purple-pink diamond could break auction record (CNN)Congratulations and best wishes to the newly married Ariana Grande.A representative for the singer told CNN on Monday that Grande and real estate agent Dalton Gomez have officially tied the knot."It was tiny and intimate -- less than 20 people. The room was so happy and full of love," the singer's representative told People of the wedding ceremony. "The couple and both families couldn't be happier." The couple first went public with their relationship with the release of Grande's song "Stuck with U," in collaboration with Justin Bieber. Grande, 27, and Gomez, 25, are seen dancing together in the music video for the song. Grande announced she and Gomez were engaged in December.
